name: Hsiang-Ting Chen
content: Staff Directory | Dr Tim Chen Ã— Search University staff directory Login Dr Tim Chen Position Senior Lecturer Org Unit Computer Science Email tim.chen@adelaide.edu.au Telephone 831 39308 Location Floor/Room 4 , Ingkarni Wardli , North Terrace View My Researcher Profile Biography/ Background . . Research Interests My primary research themes are augmenting human creativity and augmenting human-machine interface. I am particularly interested in creating novel interaction systems by integrating brain-computer interface (BCI) and mixed-reality (MR) displays.
